languages.text: {n}Префект неловко шевелится, пока Стракс зачитывает, кажется, нескончаемый список прегрешений — похоже, последствия вашего нападения мешают ей сохранять подобающе бесстрастный вид.{/n}

{n}The prefect shifts awkwardly as Strachs recites the seemingly endless list of transgressions — the aftermath of your attack seems to be preventing her from maintaining a suitably dispassionate appearance.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Префект неловко шевелится, пока Стракс зачитывает, кажется, нескончаемый список прегрешений — похоже, последствия вашего нападения мешают ей сохранять подобающе бесстрастный вид.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Präfektin fühlt sich sichtlich unbehaglich, während Strachs die scheinbar endlose Liste von Verbrechen vorträgt ... die Folgen deines Angriffs scheinen zu verhindern, dass sie mit angemessener Leidenschaftslosigkeit auftritt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect shifts awkwardly as Strachs recites the seemingly endless list of transgressions — the aftermath of your attack seems to be preventing her from maintaining a suitably dispassionate appearance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Präfektin fühlt sich sichtlich unbehaglich, während Strachs die scheinbar endlose Liste von Verbrechen vorträgt ... die Folgen deines Angriffs scheinen zu verhindern, dass sie mit angemessener Leidenschaftslosigkeit auftritt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La préfète se tortille, mal à l'aise, tandis que Strachs égrène la liste apparemment interminable des transgressions. Les séquelles de votre attaque semblent l'empêcher de maintenir l'impassibilité requise en de telles circonstances.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect shifts awkwardly as Strachs recites the seemingly endless list of transgressions — the aftermath of your attack seems to be preventing her from maintaining a suitably dispassionate appearance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La préfète se tortille, mal à l'aise, tandis que Strachs égrène la liste apparemment interminable des transgressions. Les séquelles de votre attaque semblent l'empêcher de maintenir l'impassibilité requise en de telles circonstances.{/n}

languages.text: {n}当斯塔克斯忙于陈述仿佛无穷无尽的罪行清单时，行政官尴尬地换了个姿势。她之前挨了你一记重拳，此刻似乎无法以合适的姿势维持淡定的仪态。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect shifts awkwardly as Strachs recites the seemingly endless list of transgressions — the aftermath of your attack seems to be preventing her from maintaining a suitably dispassionate appearance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当斯塔克斯忙于陈述仿佛无穷无尽的罪行清单时，行政官尴尬地换了个姿势。她之前挨了你一记重拳，此刻似乎无法以合适的姿势维持淡定的仪态。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La prefecta se mueve con incomodidad mientras Strachs recita la lista interminable de transgresiones. Parece que las consecuencias de tu ataque le impiden mostrarse tan indiferente como le gustaría.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect shifts awkwardly as Strachs recites the seemingly endless list of transgressions — the aftermath of your attack seems to be preventing her from maintaining a suitably dispassionate appearance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La prefecta se mueve con incomodidad mientras Strachs recita la lista interminable de transgresiones. Parece que las consecuencias de tu ataque le impiden mostrarse tan indiferente como le gustaría.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ストラッチスが果てしなく続く違反行為のリストを読み上げる中、総監は居心地悪そうに身じろぎした。あなたの攻撃の影響により、彼女はふさわしい無感情な態度を保てなくなっているようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect shifts awkwardly as Strachs recites the seemingly endless list of transgressions — the aftermath of your attack seems to be preventing her from maintaining a suitably dispassionate appearance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ストラッチスが果てしなく続く違反行為のリストを読み上げる中、総監は居心地悪そうに身じろぎした。あなたの攻撃の影響により、彼女はふさわしい無感情な態度を保てなくなっているようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Strachs'ın sonu gelmeyecek gibi duran suçlar listesini okuduğu esnada prefekt, yerinde duramıyor. Düzenlediğin saldırının ardından duygularını gizleyemeyecek hâle gelmiş.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect shifts awkwardly as Strachs recites the seemingly endless list of transgressions — the aftermath of your attack seems to be preventing her from maintaining a suitably dispassionate appearance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Strachs, sonu gelmeyecek gibi duran suçlar listesini okurken prefekt, durduğu yerde duramıyor. Düzenlediğin saldırı ardından duygularını gizleyemeyecek bir hâle gelmiş.{/n}
